privacyLaws.description: Makes using personal information to commit financial identity fraud or theft illegal and lays out the precise criminal offenses.

privacyLaws.lawName: South Carolina Freedom of Information Act
privacyLaws.description: A state law that provides the public with the right to access government records and meetings
Mandates that all covered entities keep up security protocols and set up procedures for data breach investigation and notification.
Outlines regulations regarding the handling, ownership, and release of medical records by physicians.
